## Sprint Discipline Checklist

**Before merging, ensure:**

- [ ] **Sprint Story Reference**: Does this PR reference a sprint story? (e.g., "Story 1: ..." or "Fixes #123")
- [ ] **Acceptance Criteria Met**: All ACs from the story are complete
- [ ] **Tests Pass**: All tests passing (run `pytest` or relevant tests)
- [ ] **Sprint Progress Updated**: Updated story tasks in GitHub issue
- [ ] **Code Quality**: Follows project conventions and standards

### Checklist

- [ ] Code follows style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No new warnings or errors
- [ ] Related issues linked
